recipes.title: Grilled Veg Sandwich
recipes.description: A healthy grilled sandwich packed with fresh veggies.
steps: Spread butter and green chutney on each bread slice.
Place layers of potato, tomato, cucumber, and onion.
Sprinkle salt and pepper.
Cover with another slice of bread.
Grill or toast until golden.
Serve hot with tomato ketchup or chutney.

recipes.title: Cold Coffee with Ice Cream
recipes.description: Creamy cold coffee topped with ice cream—perfect refresher.
steps: In a blender, add milk, coffee, sugar, and ice cubes.
Blend until frothy.
Pour into a glass and top with a scoop of ice cream.
Sprinkle some coffee powder or chocolate syrup on top.
Serve chilled.

recipes.title: Veg Pizza
recipes.description: Classic veg pizza with cheese and colorful toppings.
steps: Spread pizza sauce on the base.
Add cheese and sliced vegetables.
Sprinkle oregano and chili flakes.
Bake at 200°C (400°F) for 10–12 minutes.
Cut and serve hot.

recipes.title: Chocolate Mug Cake
recipes.description: Quick chocolate mug cake ready in a minute.
steps: Mix all ingredients in a large microwave-safe mug.
Stir until smooth and lump-free.
Microwave for 1–2 minutes (depending on power).
Let it cool for a minute.
Enjoy with ice cream or chocolate syrup.

recipes.title: Veg Wrap
recipes.description: Tasty veg wrap for a light lunch or snack.
ingredients: ½ cup mixed veggies (carrot, capsicum, cabbage)
steps: Sauté vegetables in a pan with salt and pepper for 2–3 minutes.
Place the veggies on the chapati.
Add mayonnaise and chili sauce.
Roll it tightly.
Toast lightly on a pan for 1–2 minutes.
Serve warm.
